titles.title: The name of the Lord is like a strong tower,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The name of the Lord is like a strong tower,
The righteous shall run unto Him and be glad;
The name of the Lord is like a strong tower,
The righteous shall run unto Him.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And they'll go forth in victory,
Triumphing over the enemy,
And they'll go forth to kick in the gates of hell,
For they are the army of God!
